Title: Side Quest: The Necromancer
Text:
What a spooky place..
I hear strange voices in the air and everything is full of spiders.
I must overcome my fear and look around the dark fortress.
CompleteText:
What was that?
It was evil and very powerful.
Luckily I was able to get rid of it, but only for a short time.

This evil must be banished with something stronger than swords.

It can only have been him,..Sauron.. he must be the necromancer.
I must report this to Radagast.

Lets get away from this place before he comes back.
